Description: Ratio of the cost of gas ($/barrel) compared to the median wage
Target: Maintain a constant ratio year over year. No change, or a negative change indicating increased economic access, results in a perfect score. If the ratio doubles, the region scores 0.
Source: US Energy Information Administration US Bureau of Labor Statistics

Description: Fish Stock Sustainability Index (FSSI) combines information from stock assessments to measure stock sustainability on a 0-4 scale
Target: All stocks receive an FSSI score of 4

Description: Coastal points identified for human use by NOAA's Environmental Sensitivity Index
Target: At least one access point for every mile of coastline
